title: Can smart devices really make your home smart? - Quora

response.answer_text: Using smart devices, we can make smart home or home automation. Smart devices are the electronic devices that works with others devices using Wi-Fi network, Bluetooth Connectivity. It is very easy to setup smart home. Most Commonly smart devices in now days that are used such as Amazon Echo devices Smart Lighting System Sonos Wireless smart speaker Smart things system Belkin Wemo Switch Dimmer light swiches  Using these smart things, we can make a smart home. Smart lighting make a great home automation and changing light according to the our mood. Alexa is a free app that is control all smart devices and other devices. Just giving commands, control anything like turn off/on lights, open the door, manage alarms, turn on TV channel, Volume high/low and much more things. To control the light , we use the Hue app. Hue app also help us to control light turn on/off and change according to our mood. Some apps that helps to create smart lighting system such as’ Hue Disco Hue Manic Hue Pro  Alexa and smart home devices make a user’s life is very easy and smooth. You can setup Alexa very easy on your Android, Windows and MAC. Alexa skills that we use for daily purpose such as “Alexa, wake me up at 6 am every day to music”“Alexa, play a music”“Alexa, What are your deals?”“Alexa, turn off the hall lights”“Alexa, tell me a joke”“Alexa, show my calendar.""Alexa, play the song of the day."Alexa, what's on my shopping list?" However, these are the common Alexa voice commands that we use. So you can also create a smart home with smart home devices , smart lighting system and smart things.

A new report published by Future Market Insights titled ‘Smart Home Devices Market: Global Industry Analysis (2012 – 2016) and Opportunity Assessment (2017 – 2027)’ studies the performance of the global smart home devices market over a 10 year assessment period from 2017 to 2027. The report presents the value forecast of the global smart home devices market and provides key insights on the factors driving market growth as well as the factors restricting market growth. The estimates point to a revenue growth from nearly US$ 20,800 Mn in 2017 to about US$ 125,000 Mn by 2027 end, resulting in a growth rate of 19.7% during the forecast period. Global Smart Home Devices Market: Segmentation and Forecast The report segments the global smart home devices market on the basis of component and application. The component segment is further segmented into devices and services. The lighting control devices component segment is estimated to be valued at nearly US$ 2,900 Mn in the year 2017 and is estimated to reach a value of nearly US$ 21,000 Mn in the year 2027, exhibiting a CAGR of 22.0% during the period of assessment. The security and control devices component segment is estimated to be valued at nearly US$ 3,000 Mn in the year 2017 and is estimated to reach a value of nearly US$ 21,200 Mn in the year 2027, exhibiting a CAGR of 21.6% during the forecast period.By application, the security and surveillance market is anticipated to expand at a high CAGR over the forecast period due to a growing demand for real-time remote monitoring of home security. The security and surveillance segment by application is projected to grow at the highest rate of 21.1% during the period 2017 – 2027.

Fitst of all in what context do yo mean “SMART”? At present if you see the smart home products are in a very very initial stage where you turn on/off devices by smartphone or through voice command. These present features are beginning of the Smart Home Environment. Now you have to give a command in order to do something. But Going down the road when your house starts sensing you through the help of AI and understands your habits and creates a suitable environment based on your health and habits is when we can truly call Smart Home a Smart Home!

Smart devices can be double edged swords A lot depends on the designer who creates the smart home experience Understand what tasks at home you find the most irritating or tend to forget often or if missed consume a lot of powerDecide on a hub which you would like to use to control these like Amazon Echo or Google HomeIdentify compatible devices which solve the problem.Install the devices and setup your routineExperience your routine with the devices and fine-tune it till the experience is more fun than pain.
